key.name: enabled
key.description: Whether or not the fedmsg-notify service should be running

key.name: enabled-filters
key.summary: a list of enabled fedmsg-notify filters
key.description: A space delimeted string of fedmsg-notify filters names that are enabled

key.name: emit-dbus-signals
key.description: This tells fedmsg-notify to emit a DBus signal for each message received from fedmsg. This allows desktop applications to consume messages without each having seperate connections to the bus.

key.name: filter-settings
key.description: A JSON dictionary of advanced filter settings.
